instruction: What kinds of spectrum were used to identify the smoltification status of Atlantic salmon based on spectral signatures?

instruction: What spectral feature processing methods were used to identify the smoltification status of Atlantic salmon based on spectral signatures?

instruction: What metric was chosen to identify the smoltification status of Atlantic salmon based on spectral signatures and how far can this metric go?

instruction: What machine-learning algorithm was used in the research on using optical hyperspectral sensing technique to identify the smoltification status of Atlantic salmon based on spectral signatures?

instruction: Can the analysis of spectral signatures using the optical hyperspectral sensing technique be considered a superior tool compared to traditional methods for identifying the smoltification status of Atlantic salmon?
Output: Yes.
